name: GRAVITURN
description:
Graviturn is a fun, synthwave-infused platformer about freezing time and rotating gravity to guide a glowy box through a dangerous maze!

A student project (so not completely bug-free!) by Good Game Studios.

(warning: there are flashing colours in this game)

Tip: finish the game for a treat in the credits!

CONTROLS:

Left and right arrow keys to rotate

Hit the space bar to freeze time

Collecting yellow circles adds 3 seconds to your current time

Watch out for the spikes!

(also use your mouse/touchpad to navigate through the menu)
